name: IT Consulting Addons for WPBakery
author: codenpy

sections.description:
IT Consult Addons WPBakery – Technology & IT Solutions for WPBakery page builder is top-notch technology & creative IT addons. By using this plugin anyone can build IT/Software Services, any Business, Apps, SaaS, Data Center, Data Mining etc. It comes with modern designed.

You can build amazing professional layouts for your site with tons of powerfull shortcodes. 20+ addons custom modern addons for it consulting and business wpbakery page builder addons. Works with latest WPBakery Page Builder v6.6.x

Live Demo

Features

  • 100% Responsive all elements
  • Super easy Installation.
  • Unlimited Colors.
  • Tons of customization options.
  • Powerfull Shortcodes.
  • SEO friendly.
  • Easy user interface.
  • Works with any theme.
  • All Major browser supported.
sections.installation:
Installing this plugin as regular wordpress plugin. First you need to install WPBakery Page Builder plugin and after that install WPBakery IT Consulting Addons.

This addon plugin works like other wpbakery page builder addon plugin. Go to new page then click on WPBakery Page builder then click on Add Element you should see “IT Consult Addons” on Menu Top, click on it you will see shortcode item list.
